description:
The dog days are over!狗狗们又惨了！

Victoria Smurfit, who played the murderous Cruella De Vil, will be returning to Once Upon a Time, TVGuide.com has learned. She will be back for the second half of the season for multiple episodes, but she is not appearing in the 100th episode.Victoria Smurfit扮演的反派Cruella De Vil将会回归《童话镇》。她将会在本季后半季中有多集戏份，不过她不会出现在第100集。

But wait, didn't she die when Emma (Jennifer Morrison) blasted her off a cliff? Yes, yes, she did. There's no word on exactly how the dastardly damsel of the dalmatians will return.不过她不是被Emma干掉了么？是的是的，剧情里是死了，但是我们暂时还不知道她会用什么方式回归。

What's your best guess on how Cruella will return? 你们猜猜，Cruella会用什么方式回归呢？
